tasks.title: Vent Valve Inspection
tasks.description: Inspect and verify the suit vent valve seals for microfractures.

tasks.title: Battery Health Check
tasks.description: Run diagnostics on the power cell and log charge/discharge behaviour.

tasks.title: Check telemetry
tasks.description: Verify all sensor feeds (O2, CO2, temperature, power) are nominal.

tasks.title: Collect ice sample
tasks.description: Use the sampling arm to collect a small ice fragment from the surface.

tasks.title: Dock to module A3
tasks.description: Manually align and secure docking clamps to module A3.

tasks.title: Replace coolant line
tasks.description: Remove the damaged coolant line and install the replacement section.

tasks.title: Verify thermal readings
tasks.description: Verify external and internal thermal sensors are within expected range.
